name: Flappy Dragon (Alarix)
description:
Flappy Dragon

Press green flag.

Choose your dragon.

Click Play.

Use space or click anywhere to make the dragon flap their wings!

Remake of https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/598608955/ (my old acc)

Image by upklyak on Freepik
